long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smartnoise

Offers a white noise overlay to your browser experience along with auditory white or brown noise.

The noise (same as used in our research) has shown to benefit attention and reading ability for some individuals.

This application is based on Prof. Göran Söderlund's research, Western Norway University of Applied Sciences.
